javelin.model.unit.feat.attack.expertise

Class CombatExpertise

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.unit.feat.Feat
      • javelin.model.unit.feat.attack.expertise.ExpertiseFeat
        • javelin.model.unit.feat.attack.expertise.CombatExpertise
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class CombatExpertise
extends ExpertiseFeat
    This is offering the action "Attack defensively", with the appropriate enhancements for the feat. Not otherwise available to prevent overloading the AI with options.
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    ImprovedGrapple, Serialized Form
